video.title: Damages
video.synopsis: In this acclaimed drama, Emmy winner Glenn Close is riveting as a morally challenged lawyer extraordinaire who rules the New York legal scene.

episodes.synopsis: An ambitious young lawyer joins a high-profile litigator to expose a CEO's stock market manipulation and ends up as a suspect in a gruesome murder.
episodes.title: Get Me a Lawyer

episodes.synopsis: After Katie is prepped to testify in the case against Frobisher, Patty suspects she's withholding key information.
episodes.title: Jesus, Mary and Joe Cocker

episodes.synopsis: As a bomb threat puts Patty and her family on edge, Ellen's loyalty to the firm is tested.
episodes.title: And My Paralyzing Fear of Death

episodes.synopsis: Although she's sure that she's ready to help nail Frobisher, Katie sees that she has been used after the accuracy of her deposition is challenged.
episodes.title: Tastes Like a Ho Ho

episodes.synopsis: As Tom faces a tough career decision, Ellen and David's long hours at work jeopardize their relationship.
episodes.title: A Regular Earl Anthony

episodes.synopsis: With the case pushing Ellen and David's relationship to the breaking point, Gregory Malina comes under increasing pressure to testify.
episodes.title: She Spat at Me

episodes.synopsis: As Fiske works to keep Gregory Malina from being deposed, Patty sows seeds of doubt between Tom and Ellen.
episodes.title: We Are Not Animals

episodes.synopsis: Patty tries to contain the damage caused by Malina's sudden disappearance and an insider who's leaking privileged information to Frobisher.
episodes.title: Blame the Victim

episodes.synopsis: As the executive looks to force a settlement by providing Patty's team some critical information, Gregory Malina emerges from hiding.
episodes.title: Do You Regret What We Did?

episodes.synopsis: As the deposition is getting under way, Patty suspects that someone on her staff has been leaking confidential information to Frobisher's legal team.
episodes.title: Sort of Like a Family

episodes.synopsis: Though she refuses Patty's offer to come back to work, Ellen agrees to return to press Moore for more information that could help nail Frobisher.
episodes.title: I Hate These People

episodes.synopsis: Fiske's suicide prompts Frobisher to unleash everything he has to gain control of evidence that could undermine him in court.
episodes.title: There's No We Anymore

episodes.synopsis: As Ellen uses the Malina videotape to fight the charges that she killed her fiancé, Patty engineers a confrontation with Frobisher.
episodes.title: Because I Know Patty

episodes.synopsis: As Ellen deals with her fiancé's murder, an old acquaintance reappears to seek Patty's help in protecting him from an employer's deadly revenge.
episodes.title: I Lied, Too

episodes.synopsis: With Patty going after those who killed Daniel Purcell's wife, Ellen works with the FBI to lure Tom into making an illegal payment.
episodes.title: Burn It, Shred It, I Don't Care

episodes.synopsis: Patty's efforts to defend Daniel Purcell uncover their complicated history together and force an energy-industry giant to take drastic measures.
episodes.title: I Knew You Were a Pig

episodes.synopsis: As the arrest of a suspect clears Daniel Purcell in the murder of his wife, Tom and Ellen uncover evidence that could support Patty's lawsuit.
episodes.title: Hey! Mr. Pibb!

episodes.synopsis: As Patty refuses to back off her efforts to punish UNR, Ellen looks to keep the government's case against her boss from being derailed.
episodes.title: I Agree, It Wasn't Funny

episodes.synopsis: After using a TV interview to accuse CEO Kendrick of murder, Patty tracks down an unlikely shareholder to be the plaintiff in a lawsuit against UNR.
episodes.title: A Pretty Girl in a Leotard

episodes.synopsis: As Frobisher prepares for his role in the UNR lawsuit, Ellen's FBI handlers focus on Uncle Pete to get the information they need to nail Patty.
episodes.title: New York Sucks

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Uncle Pete's suicide attempt, Patty forges ahead with the UNR lawsuit, even as her lead plaintiff is being pressured to drop out.
episodes.title: They Had to Tweeze That Out of My Kidney

episodes.synopsis: Patty suspects there's a government conspiracy aimed at undermining her lawsuit against UNR, and she attempts to prove it.
episodes.title: You Got Your Prom Date Pregnant

episodes.synopsis: As Patty refuses an offer to drop the lawsuit, Maddox begins to suspect Kendrick of an illegal market manipulation scheme.
episodes.title: Uh Oh. Out Come the Skeletons

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Agent Harrison's death, Ellen hires her own investigator to connect Patty and Frobisher to David's murder.
episodes.title: London. Of Course

episodes.synopsis: As Daniel Purcell struggles to conceal his involvement in his wife's murder, Ellen and the FBI set out to catch Patty bribing a judge.
episodes.title: Look What He Dug Up This Time

episodes.synopsis: As she looks to have Patty jailed at last, Ellen's plan unravels amid a series of complex double crosses.
episodes.title: Trust Me

episodes.synopsis: Patty pursues a lawsuit involving a Ponzi scheme, and Ellen starts her life over by prosecuting drug crimes in the D.A.'s office.
episodes.title: Your Secrets Are Safe

episodes.synopsis: Joe Tobin learns of a fortune stashed away as a result of his father's Ponzi scheme, and Patty and Tom pursue justice for the fraud's angry investors.
episodes.title: The Dog Is Happier Without Her

episodes.synopsis: As Joe Tobin and his lawyer try to hide an incriminating witness, Patty seeks leverage with the D.A.'s investigation.
episodes.title: Flight's at 11:08

episodes.synopsis: As Patty pressures him to reveal the location of the money he stashed, Louis Tobin looks to keep his son Joe's drinking from jeopardizing the family.
episodes.title: Don't Throw That at the Chicken

episodes.synopsis: As details about Louis Tobin's affair emerge, Ellen is surprised by a reporter she worked with on the UNR case.
episodes.title: It's Not My Birthday

episodes.synopsis: As Patty and Tom work to help bankrupt investors, Joe Tobin follows a circuitous series of clues to gain access to the money his father stashed away.
episodes.title: Don't Forget to Thank Mr. Zedeck

episodes.synopsis: As the search for Tobin's ill-gotten gains leads Tom and Patty to Antigua, Ellen's investigation sheds new light on her criminal case.
episodes.title: You Haven't Replaced Me

episodes.synopsis: After coming up empty-handed in Antigua, Patty and Tom turn their attention to the missing Carol Tobin in their search for her late father's money.
episodes.title: I Look Like Frankenstein

episodes.synopsis: As Patty and Tom zero in on Carol Tobin in their search for her father's hidden fortune, Ellen reluctantly tries to help her jailed sister.
episodes.title: Drive It Through Hardcore

episodes.synopsis: As Patty and Tom face removal from the Tobin case, Ellen pressures Tessa Marchetti to cooperate with the district attorney's investigation.
episodes.title: Tell Me I'm Not Racist

episodes.synopsis: Tessa Marchetti's arrest pushes Patty into making a deal with the D.A.; Ellen uncovers the truth about her parents; and Tobin takes drastic action.
episodes.title: All That Crap About Your Family

episodes.synopsis: Tom's personal involvement in the Tobin case forces him to resign, and he looks to cut a bold deal that will help recoup his losses.
episodes.title: You Were His Little Monkey

episodes.synopsis: Patty's relentless pursuit of the Tobin family's hidden fortune exposes webs of deceit that propel everyone into a series of deadly confrontations.
episodes.title: The Next One's Gonna Go in Your Throat

episodes.synopsis: As Patty prepares to sue a multinational drug maker, Ellen asks a former classmate to help expose a security firm's illegal actions in Afghanistan.
episodes.title: There's Only One Way to Try a Case

episodes.synopsis: After her bosses are persuaded to pursue a lawsuit against High Star Security, Ellen learns that they caved under pressure and reneged on the deal.
episodes.title: I've Done Way Too Much for This Girl

episodes.synopsis: As Ellen returns to the Hewes & Associates office to pursue her lawsuit against Howard Erickson, Patty's search for her missing son leads to Boston.
episodes.title: I'd Prefer My Old Office

episodes.synopsis: While being held hostage in Afghanistan, Sanchez sends a resident operative to New York City with a message for Ellen.
episodes.title: Next One's on Me, Blondie

episodes.synopsis: High Star's CEO turns to a Department of Defense contact to stop the release of incriminating confidential files.
episodes.title: We'll Just Have to Find Another Way to Cut the Balls Off of This Thing

episodes.synopsis: Ellen closes in on a CIA cover-up of an illegal intelligence mission in Afghanistan that could bring down Erickson.
episodes.title: Add That Little Hopper to Your Stew

episodes.synopsis: As Erickson looks to cover up a botched mission in Afghanistan, Ellen and Patty seek a source inside the CIA to help in their lawsuit against him.
episodes.title: I'm Worried About My Dog

episodes.synopsis: As she sends a reporter to Afghanistan to find Sanchez, Ellen teams with Patty to depose Erickson.
episodes.title: The War Will Go on Forever

episodes.synopsis: As Sanchez's life hangs in the balance, Ellen and Patty face an important decision when Boorman offers to sell out Erickson to protect an Afghan boy.
episodes.title: There's a Whole Slew of Ladies with Bad Things to Say About the Taliban

episodes.synopsis: Four years after the Tobin case, Ellen asks for Patty's help in representing a friend wronged by a security firm working in Afghanistan.
episodes.title: Failure Is Lonely

episodes.synopsis: When a whistleblower approaches Channing McClaren, it lays the foundation for a case that pits Patty and Ellen against each other.
episodes.title: You Want To End This Once and For All?

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious hacker claims to have more details about the Princefield leak. A former colleague of Patty's offers Ellen her services.
episodes.title: Have You Met The Eel Yet?

episodes.synopsis: Ellen confronts McClaren about inconsistencies in his story. Ellen's mother seeks her help.
episodes.title: Failure Is Failure

episodes.synopsis: Patty and Ellen dig deeper into the source of the Princefield leak. Meanwhile, Patty uses the press to battle Ellen.
episodes.title: I Love You Mommy

episodes.synopsis: Someone from McClaren's personal life sheds light on his past. Patty confronts an adversary.
episodes.title: There's Something Wrong With Me

episodes.synopsis: The attack Ellen suffered years ago comes back to haunt her.
episodes.title: I Need To Win

episodes.synopsis: A snowstorm leaves Patty and Ellen stranded. McClaren uncovers a key player in the trading scandal.
episodes.title: The Storm's Moving In

episodes.synopsis: Ellen begins to uncover the truth about her attacker. Chris Sanchez approaches McClaren with information.
episodes.title: I'm Afraid of What I'll Find

episodes.synopsis: McClaren's latest leak thrusts Ellen into the spotlight. Tensions between McClaren and Rutger Simon come to a head.
episodes.title: I Like Your Chair

episodes.synopsis: In the series finale, Patty and Ellen face off against each other in court, and the shocking results alter their lives forever.
episodes.title: But You Don't Do That Anymore
